content:
Which philosopher is known for his work "Meditations on First Philosophy" and is often credited with the phrase "I think, therefore I am"?
A. Socrates
B. René Descartes
C. Friedrich Nietzsche
D. Immanuel Kant
E. None of the above
René Descartes is the philosopher known for his work "Meditations on First Philosophy" and is often credited with the phrase "I think, therefore I am." So, the correct answer is B. René Descartes.
